mapper.insert:
SELECT schedules_intranet_seq.NEXTVAL FROM dual
INSERT INTO schedules_intranet ( id, member_id, schedule_type, title, description, start_date, end_date, start_time, end_time, days_used, approver_id, document_id, status, holiday_work_date, substitute_holiday_date, created_at, updated_at ) VALUES ( #{id}, #{memberId}, #{scheduleType}, #{title}, #{description, jdbcType=CLOB}, #{startDate, jdbcType=DATE}, #{endDate, jdbcType=DATE}, #{startTime, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{endTime, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{daysUsed}, #{approverId, jdbcType=NUMERIC}, #{documentId, jdbcType=NUMERIC}, #{status}, #{holidayWorkDate, jdbcType=DATE}, #{substituteHolidayDate, jdbcType=DATE}, CURRENT_TIMESTAMP, CURRENT_TIMESTAMP )
mapper.update: UPDATE schedules_intranet SET schedule_type = #{scheduleType}, title = #{title}, description = #{description, jdbcType=CLOB}, start_date = #{startDate, jdbcType=DATE}, end_date = #{endDate, jdbcType=DATE}, start_time = #{startTime, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, end_time = #{endTime, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, days_used = #{daysUsed}, approver_id = #{approverId, jdbcType=NUMERIC}, document_id = #{documentId, jdbcType=NUMERIC}, status = #{status}, holiday_work_date = #{holidayWorkDate, jdbcType=DATE}, substitute_holiday_date = #{substituteHolidayDate, jdbcType=DATE}, updated_at = CURRENT_TIMESTAMP WHERE id = #{id}
mapper.select: SELECT s.*, m.name as member_name, m.email as member_email, d.name as department_name FROM schedules_intranet s LEFT JOIN members_intranet m ON s.member_id = m.id LEFT JOIN departments_intranet d ON m.department_id = d.id WHERE s.id = #{id}

SELECT s.*, m.name as member_name, m.email as member_email, d.name as department_name FROM schedules_intranet s LEFT JOIN members_intranet m ON s.member_id = m.id LEFT JOIN departments_intranet d ON m.department_id = d.id ORDER BY s.start_date DESC

SELECT s.*, m.name as member_name, m.email as member_email, d.name as department_name FROM schedules_intranet s LEFT JOIN members_intranet m ON s.member_id = m.id LEFT JOIN departments_intranet d ON m.department_id = d.id WHERE s.member_id = #{memberId} ORDER BY COALESCE(s.start_date, s.holiday_work_date) DESC

SELECT s.*, m.name as member_name, m.email as member_email, d.name as department_name FROM schedules_intranet s LEFT JOIN members_intranet m ON s.member_id = m.id LEFT JOIN departments_intranet d ON m.department_id = d.id WHERE ( -- 일반 일정: start_date, end_date 사용 (s.start_date IS NOT NULL AND s.start_date <= #{endDate} AND s.end_date >= #{startDate}) OR -- 휴일근무: holiday_work_date, substitute_holiday_date 사용 (s.schedule_type = 'HOLIDAY_WORK' AND ( (s.holiday_work_date >= #{startDate} AND s.holiday_work_date <= #{endDate}) OR (s.substitute_holiday_date >= #{startDate} AND s.substitute_holiday_date <= #{endDate}) )) ) ORDER BY COALESCE(s.start_date, s.holiday_work_date)

SELECT s.*, m.name as member_name, m.email as member_email, d.name as department_name FROM schedules_intranet s LEFT JOIN members_intranet m ON s.member_id = m.id LEFT JOIN departments_intranet d ON m.department_id = d.id WHERE m.department_id = #{departmentId} AND ( (s.start_date IS NOT NULL AND s.start_date <= #{endDate} AND s.end_date >= #{startDate}) OR (s.schedule_type = 'HOLIDAY_WORK' AND ( (s.holiday_work_date >= #{startDate} AND s.holiday_work_date <= #{endDate}) OR (s.substitute_holiday_date >= #{startDate} AND s.substitute_holiday_date <= #{endDate}) )) ) ORDER BY COALESCE(s.start_date, s.holiday_work_date)

SELECT s.*, m.name as member_name, m.email as member_email, d.name as department_name FROM schedules_intranet s INNER JOIN members_intranet m ON s.member_id = m.id INNER JOIN departments_intranet d ON m.department_id = d.id WHERE d.parent_id = #{divisionId} AND ( (s.start_date IS NOT NULL AND s.start_date <= #{endDate} AND s.end_date >= #{startDate}) OR (s.schedule_type = 'HOLIDAY_WORK' AND ( (s.holiday_work_date >= #{startDate} AND s.holiday_work_date <= #{endDate}) OR (s.substitute_holiday_date >= #{startDate} AND s.substitute_holiday_date <= #{endDate}) )) ) ORDER BY COALESCE(s.start_date, s.holiday_work_date)

SELECT s.*, m.name as member_name, m.email as member_email, d.name as department_name FROM schedules_intranet s LEFT JOIN members_intranet m ON s.member_id = m.id LEFT JOIN departments_intranet d ON m.department_id = d.id WHERE s.document_id = #{documentId} ORDER BY s.start_date DESC

SELECT s.*, m.name as member_name, m.email as member_email, d.name as department_name FROM schedules_intranet s LEFT JOIN members_intranet m ON s.member_id = m.id LEFT JOIN departments_intranet d ON m.department_id = d.id WHERE s.schedule_type = 'SECURITY_REQUEST' AND s.status = 'APPROVED' AND TRUNC(s.start_date) = TRUNC(#{startDate}) AND s.start_time < #{endTime} AND s.end_time > #{startTime}

SELECT s.*, m.name as member_name, m.email as member_email, d.name as department_name FROM schedules_intranet s LEFT JOIN members_intranet m ON s.member_id = m.id LEFT JOIN departments_intranet d ON m.department_id = d.id WHERE s.member_id = #{memberId} AND s.schedule_type = 'HOLIDAY_WORK' AND s.status NOT IN ('CANCELLED', 'REJECTED') AND ( TRUNC(s.holiday_work_date) = TRUNC(#{holidayWorkDate}) OR TRUNC(s.substitute_holiday_date) = TRUNC(#{substituteHolidayDate}) OR TRUNC(s.holiday_work_date) = TRUNC(#{substituteHolidayDate}) OR TRUNC(s.substitute_holiday_date) = TRUNC(#{holidayWorkDate}) )
AND s.id != #{excludeId}
